name: Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
description: Experience pure audio with industry-leading active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Perfect for travel or focused work.

name: Minimalist Smartwatch Series 5
description: Track your fitness, heart rate, and notifications seamlessly. Features an always-on AMOLED display and 5-day battery.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Designed for long hours with breathable mesh, lumbar support, and adjustable armrests to keep your posture perfect.

name: Mechanical Keyboard Pro
description: Tactile, responsive, and beautifully crafted with customizable RGB lighting and hot-swappable switches for the ultimate typing experience.

name: Ceramic Pour-Over Coffee Maker
description: Brew the perfect cup every morning. The ceramic cone allows for superior heat retention and consistent extraction.

name: Ultra-Wide Gaming Monitor
description: Immerse yourself completely with this 34-inch curved display, 144Hz refresh rate, and vibrant 4K resolution.

name: Modern Plant Pot
description: Elevate your indoor garden with this sleek, matte-finish ceramic pot. Includes drainage hole and matching saucer.

name: Leather Messenger Bag
description: Handcrafted full-grain leather bag with a padded laptop compartment and multiple organizer pockets for the modern professional.
